Replying to @philhawksworth 2020-01-02 18:57
@irreverentmike @Netlify Try setting a different NODE_ENV value for different deploy contexts (stage | prod etc) and then programmatically accessing different env vars as a result. if (process.env.NODE_ENV=="production") { const secretThing = process.env.myProdSecret; }
